Comment: 1.e4 - Tried and true

1... e5 - This takes me well out of my element. I'm not a fan of Classical play because I'd rather not memorize the vast numbers of lines. I guess I played it because I wanted a different flavour to my game than usual. Only after I made the move did I notice the gap in ratings. Here I thought, "This may have been a mistake."
Initiating Petroff's Defense and avoiding the Ruy Lopez. I hope to take White out of his book as well and just get down and dirty.
